1.details: Create the missing Supabase table for transaction volume charts to fix the /api/charts/transaction-volume/ endpoint

2.content: Implement multi-API strategy with DexScreener and CoinGecko
2.details: Replace premium Solscan endpoints with free APIs: DexScreener for real-time prices, CoinGecko for metadata, Solana RPC for blockchain data

3.content: Fix transaction-volume chart with real-time data
3.details: Implement the missing transaction-volume chart using the new database table and API endpoints

4.details: Add caching layers for API responses, database queries, and static data to improve performance

5.details: Remove unnecessary .md files and consolidate documentation to keep only essential files

6.content: Test all endpoints and deploy optimization
6.details: Test all API endpoints, verify barchart functionality (24h and 3h intervals), and deploy to production
